mapper.select: select vid, ro_product_model, ro_product_brand, count(*) as count from ${table} where created_at > #{start} and identified='0' and ro_product_model is not null and ro_product_model != '' and ro_product_brand is not null and ro_product_brand != '' group by vid, ro_product_model,ro_product_brand order by count desc limit 1000

select vid,return_product_id as product_id,ro_product_model, count(*) as count from ${table} where created_at > #{start} and return_product_id !='' and return_product_id != 'android-device' and return_product_id not like '%emulator' and ro_product_model !='' group by vid,ro_product_model,product_id order by product_id, count desc
